import sys
a = input()
b = input()
if a != b:
    print(max(len(a), len(b)))
else:
    print(-1)

from sys import stdin, stdout

f = stdin.readline().strip()
s = stdin.readline().strip()

if f == s:
    stdout.write('-1')
else:
    stdout.write(str(max(len(s), len(f))))
